title: BitcoinUpOnly
author: BitcoinUpOnly
content: Hi fellow Bitcoin traders,There is a new Cryptocurrency Trading Dashboard where you can view derivative exchange data from Bitcoin and Ethereum in a one-page view. It's called Whaleportal (https://whaleportal.com/).This can help you better grip the markets for shorter-term timeframes.The chances for traders to create successful trading strategies significantly increase if you use derivative exchange data in your analysis.
